title: Given Movie
synopsis: The band "given"—comprised of Ritsuka Uenoyama, Mafuyu Satou, Haruki Nakayama, and Akihiko Kaji—has advanced to the final screening of the Countdown-fes Amateur Contest, in which they will be judged on their live act. Although enthusiastic, they worry about having only one original song to perform.
characters: ['Satou, Mafuyu', 'Uenoyama, Ritsuka', 'Nakayama, Haruki', 'Kaji, Akihiko', 'Murata, Ugetsu', 'Kashima, Hiiragi', 'Yagi, Shizusumi', 'Yatake, Kouji']
